column4: anyone knows how to install the vbox guest additions when running ubuntu live cd with virtualbox (since I have only one slot for images)?
wanna test unity on vbox
unity didn't work on my vbox
aaah crap :/, ok then
but you did install the additions?
though i allocated 2 cores and 900 mb ram
no.
well, that's why you didn't have it
give it a try
will do
how much resources are you allocating
1GB RAM
good. first 'try ubuntu'. i sure unity will fail to load.
then install and see
sure, it failed, i've tested already; i mounted the iso with 'mount -o loop' so i'll try it out now

i mean, you can't choose to mount /mnt/loop, in example... you can only choose physical drives and isos..
why not use the direct iso file
cause i can't mount the vbox additions iso later to install the additions...
